SEARCH
Module OOP
Package OOPProject

Class StaffCSV

java.lang.Object
OOPProject.StaffCSV
All Implemented Interfaces:
AdminStaffManagement
public class StaffCSV extends Object implements AdminStaffManagement
The StaffCSV class manages the creation and storage of hospital staff records in CSV files. This includes administrators, doctors, and pharmacists. It implements the AdminStaffManagement interface.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    StaffCSV()
    Constructs a StaffCSV object and initializes the file path mappings for different staff roles.

  • Method Details

    • generateStaffId

      public String generateStaffId(Role role)
      Generates a unique hospital staff ID based on the given role.
      Parameters:
      role - the role of the staff member (e.g., DOCTOR, PHARMACIST, ADMINISTRATOR).
      Returns:
      a unique hospital ID with a prefix indicating the role.

    • addAdmin

      public void addAdmin(String hospitalId, String password, Role role, Gender gender, String administratorName, Boolean firstTimeLogin)
      Adds a new administrator to the CSV file.
      Specified by:
      addAdmin in interface AdminStaffManagement
      Parameters:
      hospitalId - the unique ID of the administrator.
      password - the administrator's password.
      role - the role of the staff member (ADMINISTRATOR).
      gender - the gender of the administrator.
      administratorName - the name of the administrator.
      firstTimeLogin - flag indicating if it's the administrator's first login.

    • addDoctor

      public void addDoctor(String hospitalId, String password, Role role, Gender gender, String doctorName, String department, String specialisation, Boolean firstTimeLogin)
      Adds a new doctor to the CSV file.
      Specified by:
      addDoctor in interface AdminStaffManagement
      Parameters:
      hospitalId - the unique ID of the doctor.
      password - the doctor's password.
      role - the role of the staff member (DOCTOR).
      gender - the gender of the doctor.
      doctorName - the name of the doctor.
      department - the department the doctor belongs to.
      specialisation - the doctor's specialization.
      firstTimeLogin - flag indicating if it's the doctor's first login.

    • addPharmacist

      public void addPharmacist(String hospitalId, String password, Role role, Gender gender, String pharmacistName, Boolean firstTimeLogin)
      Adds a new pharmacist to the CSV file.
      Specified by:
      addPharmacist in interface AdminStaffManagement
      Parameters:
      hospitalId - the unique ID of the pharmacist.
      password - the pharmacist's password.
      role - the role of the staff member (PHARMACIST).
      gender - the gender of the pharmacist.
      pharmacistName - the name of the pharmacist.
      firstTimeLogin - flag indicating if it's the pharmacist's first login.

    • writeToCSV

      public void writeToCSV(Object staffMember)
      Writes the given staff member's information to the appropriate CSV file based on their role.
      Specified by:
      writeToCSV in interface AdminStaffManagement
      Parameters:
      staffMember - the staff member object (Administrator, Doctor, or Pharmacist).
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the staff member type is unsupported.
